data.title: Clippers waive newly acquired Carlos Delfino and Miroslav Raduljica
authors: Hispanosnba.com: Noticias y estad√≠sticas de la NBA
data.meta_description: The Los Angeles Clippers announced today that the team has waived guard/forward Carlos Delfino and center Miroslav Raduljica.
data.text:
The Los Angeles Clippers announced today that the team has waived guard/forward Carlos Delfino and center Miroslav Raduljica.

Delfino and Raduljica were acquired by the Clippers on August 26, 2014 in exchange for forward Jared Dudley and a protected 2017 first round draft pick.

The Clippers will stretch both players' contracts, meaning their remaining guaranteed money will be spread evenly across the next five seasons (twice the number of years remaining on their contracts plus one).
